page.title: 11Diary of Tuesday 11 June 85
page.content: I started the day by taking the dog for a walk. When I got home I went to {school.}At school we played football which we did at both other breaks. Then we did work on the{computer.}We used the{turtle}which is a device controlled through infra red from the computer. After break I had write this diary. When we had finished dinner we wrote about our houses for the Domesday Survey. After that we did {athletics,}400 and 800 metres running. After running we came in. Then we went home. When I got home I made some coconut ice. Then I watched television. I went to{guides}with my friend. After guides I came home and had my dinner. After making a jelly for Mum I went to bed. by Jacqueline Harrison
